text: Television networks in Uzbekistan can be divided into three categories: * National Television and Radio Company of Uzbekistan (MTRK) networks * Regional television networks of NTRC * Private television networks ==Table of broadcast networks== All of the networks listed below operate a number of terrestrial television stations. In addition, several of these networks are also aired on cable and satellite services. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=7 style="font-size:120%" | Table of broadcast television networks |- !colspan=7 style="font-size:110%" | National Television and Radio Company of Uzbekistan (MTRK) networks |- !
